Monday, June 5, 2023.Lunch: Turkey and Avocado Wraps: Sliced roast turkey and ripe avocado wrapped in whole grain tortillas, dressed with a light spread of Dijon mustard and mixed greens for a refreshing crunch.
Monday, June 5, 2023.Dinner: Singapore Mei Fun: Traditional stir-fried rice vermicelli with vegetables, shrimp, pork, and chicken, seasoned with curry powder, soy sauce, and a touch of heat from chili sauce.

Tuesday, June 6, 2023.Breakfast: Yogurt Parfait: Layered Greek yogurt, homemade granola, and a mix of fresh berries for a refreshing start of the day. Drizzle with a little honey to sweeten, if desired.
Tuesday, June 6, 2023.Lunch: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad: Grilled chicken strips atop a bed of crisp romaine lettuce, tossed in Caesar dressing, with croutons and shaved parmesan.
Tuesday, June 6, 2023.Dinner: Beef Stir-Fry with Snow Peas and Carrots: Lean cuts of beef quickly stir-fried with crisp snow peas and carrots in a savory ginger garlic sauce.

Wednesday, June 7, 2023.Breakfast: Avocado Toast: Whole grain toast topped with ripe mashed avocado, a sprinkle of sea salt, and a touch of red pepper flakes. Serve with a side of poached eggs for protein.
Wednesday, June 7, 2023.Lunch: Caprese Panini: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and aromatic basil layered in ciabatta bread, drizzled with balsamic glaze, then pressed until crispy.
Wednesday, June 7, 2023.Dinner: Carne Asada Tacos: Store-bought carne asada grilled to perfection and served on corn tortillas with pico de gallo and a squeeze of lime.

Thursday, June 8, 2023.Breakfast: Belgian Waffles: Fluffy and golden Belgian waffles, served with maple syrup, fresh berries, and a dusting of powdered sugar.
Thursday, June 8, 2023.Lunch: Quinoa Chicken Salad with Pesto: Grilled chicken, quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and arugula tossed in homemade pesto dressing.
Thursday, June 8, 2023.Dinner: Order In: A break from home-cooked meals, enjoy your favorite local eatery or try something new.

Friday, June 9, 2023.Breakfast: Banana Peanut Butter Protein Shakes: Blend frozen bananas, natural peanut butter, Greek yogurt, a drizzle of honey, and almond milk for a quick, protein-packed breakfast on the go.
Friday, June 9, 2023.Lunch: Greek Pita Pockets: Pita bread filled with grilled chicken, tomatoes, cucumbers, kalamata olives, feta cheese, and a homemade tzatziki sauce.
Friday, June 9, 2023.Dinner: Meatball Subs with Side Salad: Italian meatball subs topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. Serve with a side of green salad.

Saturday, June 10, 2023.Breakfast: Eggs Benedict: English muffin halves topped with Canadian bacon, poached eggs, and creamy hollandaise sauce. Serve with a side of roasted asparagus.
Saturday, June 10, 2023.Lunch: Stir-Fried Beef and Broccoli: Tender strips of beef stir-fried with fresh broccoli florets in a savory garlic sauce. Serve over steamed jasmine rice.
Saturday, June 10, 2023.Dinner: Chicken Quesadillas with Salsa: Cheesy chicken quesadillas served with fresh homemade salsa and a dollop of sour cream.

Sunday, June 11, 2023.Breakfast: Eggs Benedict: English muffins topped with a poached egg, ham, and rich hollandaise sauce.
Sunday, June 11, 2023.Lunch: Chef's Salad: A hearty salad featuring a variety of deli meats and cheeses, hard-boiled eggs, tomatoes, cucumbers, and your choice of dressing.
Sunday, June 11, 2023.Dinner: One-Pot Sausage and Broccoli Pasta Bake: Sausage and broccoli combined with pasta in a rich tomato sauce, topped with cheese and baked until golden.
